text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

text: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

text: Fall in love with the process and the results will come.
author: Eric Thomas

text: We’re here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?
author: Steve Jobs

text: Sweet dollar tea from McDonald’s... I drink that. Supa Hot Fire... I spit that. Two and a half men... I WATCH THAT!
author: Supa Hot Fire

text: I broke up with my ex girl... here’s her number... SIKE! That’s the wrong number!
author: Supa Hot Fire

text: I’m not a businessman, I’m a business, man.
author: Jay-Z

text: Your biggest fear is someone elses career.
author: Rigel Leonard

text: Not every weather person is a pilot but every pilot is a weather person.
author: Rigel Leonard
